title: Tough Losses
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the Celtics can recover from their Game 5 loss, what happened to the warriors in their 39 point loss and which NHL win was bigger; the Panthers or the Rangers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
